lines.text: The role of cynic doesn't really suit you, Brown.
I don't believe in play-acting either.
You imagine because you've lost one faith, you've lost all? You're wrong, Brown. There is always an alternative to the faith we lose.
I have no faith in faith.

[to Brown]
They are waiting for Major Jones. For some reason they believe that only white men are experts in killing.
I'm worried about young Philipot. I had a message from him today.
He doesn't read Karl Marx, if that's what you mean. Rebels are not always communists, unless America insists.
Papa Doc allows us to study the theory of communism. If there were no communists at all, what help would he get from the United States?
